pullRequest.title: Add UI Tests in MSAL
pullRequest.bodyText:
In this PR, I've added E2E UI tests for MSAL. These are the existing manual tests in MSAL test plan located here (CORPNET required):
- MSAL 1.5.0 with Broker test cases  https://identitydivision.visualstudio.com/Engineering/_testPlans/execute?planId=990700&opId=204&suiteId=990701
- Broker-less MSAL 1.5.0 test cases https://identitydivision.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/DevEx/_testPlans/execute?planId=990703&opId=205&suiteId=990704
- MSAL 1.5.0 USGov Sov Cloud test cases
https://identitydivision.visualstudio.com/Engineering/_testPlans/execute?planId=990705&opId=206&suiteId=990706
All the test cases aren't automated yet. At this time, we've automated about 14 test cases. The remaining 10 test cases will be automated in the upcoming weeks.
To automate the test cases, we've added a new module to the MSAL project called as MSAL Automation App, and all the tests are located inside this module.
For automating these test cases, we are using the UI Automator framework. We are also using the Android Test Orchestrator to ensure that the test state is completely cleared between each test.
This PR depends on common PR: AzureAD/microsoft-authentication-library-common-for-android#911 and most of the logic for handling UI is located in that common PR.

commit.message: Initial commit for msal automation app
Initial commit for ui autmation tests
Add msal automated test, remove unused files
Automate msal us gov sov cloud test plan
Move ui test utilities to its own module
Add ui automator versions to versions.gradle
Add ui automation utilities to msal project
Remove test application id; fix comment
Remove acquire token btn from automation app

nodes.bodyText: This is probably not being used, and needs to be removed.

nodes.bodyText:
This naming works....only as long as the ids don't change and we don't move out of ADO.....
Would be perhaps to future-proof to include a description of the test rather than an id of a test elsewhere?
Call out: I love how easy to read this test it

commit.message: Remove mockito from automation test app deps
